item.title: [allstar] omfg not another problem!
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

hey i am adding some codes into TextHandler.java and i am getting errors when i call the “voids” or methods from client.java in process.

errors :

client.java:14876: error: non-static method QuestTab(int) cannot be referenced f
rom a static context
        TextHandler.QuestTab(playerId);
                   ^
client.java:14877: error: non-static method LoadClanTab(int) cannot be reference
d from a static context
        TextHandler.LoadClanTab(playerId);
                   ^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
2 errors

added codes to process in client :

TextHandler.LoadClanTab(playerId);
TextHandler.QuestTab(playerId);

added codes to TextHandler :

	public void QuestTab(int a) {
	client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a];
}

	public void LoadClanTab(int a) {
	client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a];
}

Read full topic
